catalyst.llm generation: 3D hierarchical Z-scheme Fe 2 O 3 ZnIn 2 S 4 core-shell nanorods
catalyst.source: Herein, 3D hierarchical Z-scheme Fe 2 O 3 ZnIn 2 S 4 core-shell nanorods are reasonably designed and synthetized and directly used as a Z-Scheme CO 2 photoreduction catalyts.
catalyst.context: The challenge of sunlight-driven CO 2 reduction is to achieve efficient photocatalysts with exceptional molecule adsorption ability and efficient charge-separation efficiency.Herein, 3D hierarchical Z-scheme Fe 2 O 3 ZnIn 2 S 4 core-shell nanorods are reasonably designed and synthetized and directly used as a Z-Scheme CO 2 photoreduction catalyts.The Fe 2 O 3 ZnIn 2 S 4 core-shell nanorods exhibited a CO evolution rate of 37.13 mol g -1 h -1 , which is 2.15 times higher than that of the pristine ZnIn 2 S 4 layers.The upgraded photocatalytic activity can be ascribed to the unique 3D hierarchical structure, efficient CO 2 adsorption capacity, as well as improved separation efficiency of charge carriers.This work may create new opportunities for developing other high active complex hierarchical Z-Shceme photocatalysts.

catalyst.llm generation: Fe 2 O 3 ZnIn 2 S 4 core-shell nanorods
catalyst.source: Synthesis of the hierarchical Fe 2 O 3 ZnIn 2 S 4 core-shell nanorods. The photocatalytic CO 2 reduction activity of the as-prepared catalysts was conducted in a 500 mL PLS-SXE300 Labsolar-IIIAG closed gas system (Perfectlight, China).
catalyst.context: Reagents. Zinc chloride (ZnCl 2 ), indium chloride (InCl 3 4H 2 O), thioacetamide (TAA), ferric chloride (FeCl 3 ), polyvinyl pyrrolidone (PVP, Mw40000), potassium dihydrogen phosphate (KH 2 PO 4 ), DMF, glycerol were purchased from Sinopharm group and used without further purification in all process. Deionized (DI) water used in all process were prepared with Milli-Q water with the resistance of 18 Mcm at 25 C. In a typical process for the synthesis of spindle FeOOH nanorods, 0.8 mmol The spindle Fe 2 O 3 nanorods was obtained via a simple annealing strategy using FeOOH nanorods as precursor 32 .Typically, the as-prepared spindle FeOOH nanorods precursor were put in the muffle furnace and heated to 350 C for 2 h with a rate of 5 C min -1 .After the reaction, the products of spindle Fe 2 O 3 nanorods were collected for further modification. Before the growth of ZnIn 2 S 4 shell on Fe 2 O 3 nanorods, the obtained spindle Fe 2 O 3 nanorods need a simple surface modification via PVP.In a typical procedure, 5 mg collected Fe 2 O 3 nanorods and 100mg PVP were immersed in 2 ml water under continuous agitation and keeping at 90 C for 2 h.After the process, the products were collected via centrifugation and remove the redundant PVP. Synthesis of the hierarchical Fe 2 O 3 ZnIn 2 S 4 core-shell nanorods. The photocatalytic CO 2 reduction activity of the as-prepared catalysts was conducted in a 500 mL PLS-SXE300 Labsolar-IIIAG closed gas system (Perfectlight, China).A Xe lamp was used as light source with a focus intensity of 0.24 W cm -2 .In a typical process, 25 mg of photocatalyst was uniformly dispersed on a watch-glass and added into a gas-closed glass reactor filled with high purity CO 2 .After that, 0.5 mL of deionized water was added into the reactor.Before the reaction, the reactor was kept for 1 h to ensure that the adsorption/desorption equilibrium of can be reached.The
